name: Jayant Dyal
text: I was smiling the whole way through. I couldn't wipe the grin off my face. I can't wait to see it again.

name: Raunak Singh
text: It's rare to find a movie that's as visually stunning as it is emotionally resonant, but this one delivered on both fronts. The movie reminded me why I love cinema. I couldn't tear my eyes away from the screen.

name: shiva123
text: I was left with a smile on my face. This movie deserves all the awards. I couldn't stop thinking about it after it ended.
